links.*: The Lord of the Rings (50th Anniversary Edition)

wikitext.*:
'''''perian''''' (lit. "[[Halflings|Halfling]]"), plural '''''periain''''' and collective plural '''''Periannath''''', is both the [[Sindarin]] and [[Quenya]] name for [[Hobbits]].<ref>{{RK|V8}}, p. 859 ([[The Lord of the Rings (50th Anniversary Edition)|50th Anniv. Ed.]]): "[...] a hobbit, a ''perian'' [...]")</ref><ref>{{RGEO|Notes}}, p. 75 ("''Periannath'', 'the Hobbits (as a race),' as collective pl. of ''perian'' 'halfling' (pl. ''periain'')"</ref><ref>{{L|230}}, p. 308</ref><ref name=AppE/><ref>{{App|F2}}</ref>

==Other forms==
*''i-Pheriannath'': demonstrating [[nasal mutation]] (''i'''n-P'''eriannath'')<ref name=AppE>{{App|E1i}}, p. 1114 ([[The Lord of the Rings (50th Anniversary Edition)|50th Anniv. Ed.]])</ref><ref>{{PE|17}}, p. 66</ref>

==Cognates==
*[[Quenya]] ''[[Periando]]''
*[[Westron]] ''[[Banakil]]''
